entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Drizzle or flurries changing to flurries and periods of freezing drizzle this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries and periods of freezing drizzle ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 11 March 2023
